entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
